original_text: Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, saying, This is the law of the sin offering: In the place where the burnt offering is killed shall the sin offering be killed before the Lord: it is most holy.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들에게 말하여 이르라 속죄제의 규례는 이러하니라 속죄제 제물은 지극히 거룩하니 여호와 앞 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 그 속죄제 제물을 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: Speak unto Aaron and to his sons, saying,
This is the law of the sin offering:
In the place where the burnt offering is killed
shall the sin offering be killed before the Lord:
